page.title: 18Main Features in Otley
page.content:
The main features in Otley are:_The River,Chevin and the Markets.
RIVER(Bridge):_The bridge has been here for hundreds of years.The town is built around the river.Many years ago river was used to transport different material down to the factories which delt in them.Now the river is used for many leisure activities and by the paper mill. CHEVIN:_The Chevin overlooks all of the town and shelters it from high winds.Many activities are carried out on the Chevin,also it provides pleasant surroundings for people who enjoy walks in such places. MARKETS:_In Otley their are three markets two cattle and one goods.Many years ago the Cattle Market was to be found in Manor Square. EDITED BY BEN SWANTON.
